title: [Music]: Nunu & Willump's Login Music
body:
As of 8/23/18, they have added Nunu's Login Music to PBE & I gotta say it's definitely one of my favorite Logins so far (Overtook Pyke, but comes 2nd to Swain for me). 

Also, they added a Blue Disco Ball to Nunubot 2.0's Dance Emote.
https://imgur.com/Vxogkt0

Man, they keep making these two better & better.

replies.body: I'm happy to hear this piece is one of your favorites, thanks so much for listening & sharing! Swain was way different in tone from Nunu & Willump, but still wonderful to work on & I also love Ed's Pyke theme. <3 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
I like it, but I wonder - did you have any iteration where the flute was more prominently featured (considering Nunu's lore)? The theme has a 3:5 ratio of sections with flute vs. sections without.

Hi DarkSoul1994 & thanks for your question! Very early on I had some explorations that were purely carried by flute, however it felt more lonely than we wanted. Given that it's now both Nunu & Willump, it made us think that perhaps there could be a duet-like quality to the piece where Flute & Viol Da Gamba play their own lines, double the melody, and even call/answer in some sections. One way of listening to the piece is as follows...

Flute = Nunu
Viol Da Gamba (Cello sound) = Willump
Low Orchestra & Drums = Freljord
Voice (at the end) = Layka

While Flute still played a critical role in the piece, once we interweaved these various musical elements between background/foreground it started to feel warmer. Ultimately attempting to hit that balance of warmth, hope, and adventure in the face of a very cold and sometimes lonely Freljord. Thanks for listening!

Yay I was right about it being Layka!

That was my biggest hope for their theme was that we'd get to hear her in ther somewhere, I'm glad it was implemented!
Does the piece have a name? Or is it just 'Nunu Theme'?

Every time I listen to one of Riot's theme I'm equally amazed at how good their composers are and how bad of a composer I still am!

Once more, an amazing theme!
BLUE EYES AYYYY. Will this be reflected in his splash artin live??

Yep, the animated log in screens are actually made using the splash art. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Lil PeanutBrotha posted some tutorial videos showing how it all works [here](https://vimeo.com/user73213403).

>
> Yep, the animated log in screens are actually made using the splash art. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
> 
> Lil PeanutBrotha posted some tutorial videos showing how it all works [here](https://vimeo.com/user73213403).

You misunderstand my homie, I know how the login screens are animated. The current Nunu on PBE has brown eyes in his splash I'm asking if they have been updated and when Nunu goes live he will have blue eyes?
I get a 403 Error on your link for Nunu Bot.
